name: CureAll
description:
CureAll

created by Mitchelle V. dela Cruz
ellechtim@yahoo.com
#donate

Goal
The goal of this game is to cure all infected humans. Infected humans are very contagious, try cure everyone before they
got infected. Get the highest score.

Playing
You steer your character using the arrow keys, its auto move. 

Levels
The game has nine levels. They become increasingly harder.

Remarks
This program show how dangerous pandemic is if you dont stay at home. 

Thanks
Billie Eilish - Bad Guy  (midi by Carlo Prato) (www.cprato.com)
opengameart.org
